info.title: Offered Service Service
info.description:
Offered Services API to Singapur Project
 This microservice is in charge of setting and retrieving the different services that a professional has to offer. 
 URL Confluence: https://steps.everis.com/confluence/display/PROLEMER/Microservice+Offered+Services

get.summary: Retrieves all offered services, ordered by levels

200.description: The services are found and they are returned to the user following the level structure

get.summary: Retrieves visible content by offered service id and province id

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: Retrieves offered service with its id

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: Retrieve price of the service
Retrieves the children services of the given service

200.description: The children of the given service are returned
If the visible content exists then it's updated, if it doesn't, we add a new one

delete.summary: Delete Visible Content by offeredServiceId and provinceId

get.summary: Retrieves offered services by type

200.description: The services are found and they are returned to the user by zip code

get.summary: Retrieves details of offered services

200.description: The services details are found and they are returned to the user

get.summary: Retrieves details of offered services

200.description: The services are found and they are returned to the user following the level structure

get.summary: Retrieves offered services by zipCode

200.description: The services are found and they are returned to the user by zip code

post.summary: Retrieves a professional's offered services by filters

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: The offered service id list of a service will be retrieved taking into account its offered service master

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: Offered services actions with landong page in url

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: Offered services actions with landong page in url
Retrieve all offered services

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: Retrieves active and inactive offered service with its id

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: Retrieve all platform entity
Retrieve platform entity by code
Retrieve coupon entity relation type Description by entity id and language code
Retrieve all Coupons
Retrieve Coupon by code
Retrieve all coupon types
Retrieve coupon by code
Retrieve coupon type by coupon type ID and language code
Retrieve All Coupon Versions

post.summary: Create or Update Coupon Version. To update, the value of the id must be reported.

get.summary: Retrieve one coupon version by coupon code id

post.summary: Create or Update Coupon Version Description

get.summary: Retrieve Coupon Version Description By Coupon Version Id and Language Code
Retrieve one coupon version by code coupon
Retrieve one coupon version by coupon code id
Retrieve all terms and agreements

post.summary: Create or Update terms and agreements of a coupon

get.summary: Retrieve coupon terms and agreements by id

post.summary: Create or update coupon terms and agreements description

get.summary: Retrieve coupon terms and agreements by id and language code
Retrieve all coupon target type

post.summary: Create or update coupon target type

get.summary: Retrieve coupon target type by code
Retrieve coupon target type description by coupon type id and language code
Retrieve all coupon scopes
Retrieve coupon scope by code
Retrieve coupon scope description by coupon scope id and language code

post.summary: Create or Update coupon entity relation. To update, the value of the id must be reported.

get.summary: Retrieve all coupon entity relation types

post.summary: Create or update coupon entity relation

get.summary: Retrieve coupon entity relation by relation type ID
Retrieve coupon entity relation type Description by type id and language code
Retrieve all coupon entity relation by code
Retrieve coupon entity relation by entity ID
Retrieve coupon entity relation by coupon ID
Retrieve all campaings
Retrieve campaign by code

status.description: Result of the action, for example "Success".

code.description: Status code, extra information related to HTTP response

message.description: Specific message, result of the action

id.description: Id of the associated master service

OfferedServiceMasterRest.description: This model represents the offered service master

id.description: Id, internal identifier for the offered service

parentId.description: Id  of the corresponding parent for this serive

code.description: Service's internal code

landingPage.description: String to create url to landing page

type.description: Type of landigpage to be used

typeName.description: Type of landigpage to be used

startTimeOfferedService.description: Start date of the active service offered

endTimeOfferedService.description: End date of the active service offered

isActiveDependingEndDate.description: Id of the associated master service

OfferedServiceRest.description: This model represents the offered service

status.description: Result of the action, for example "Success".

code.description: Status code, extra information related to HTTP response

message.description: Specific message, result of the action

id.description: Id, internal identifier for the visible content

offeredServiceId.description: Id  of the corresponding offered service for this content

provinceId.description: Id  of the corresponding province for this content

sectionTitle.description: Section title of a service related to your province

OfferedServiceVisibleContentRest.description: This model represents the offered service visible content
